Comparison of visuals: The expert compared the visuals in the viral videos with other images and videos available online to determine if they were consistent with the claim being made. This included performing a reverse image search and finding similar visuals from different sources.
Analysis of accompanying text: The expert examined the text accompanying the videos to understand the context and claims being made. They assessed whether the text supported or contradicted the authenticity of the claim.
Evaluation of social media sources: The expert looked into the profiles of the users who shared the videos on Twitter and Facebook. They identified any potential biases or affiliations that could influence the credibility of the videos.
Cross: referencing with news reports: The expert referred to news reports and articles to gather additional information about the events depicted in the videos. They analyzed the consistency of the videos with the reported incidents and compared the details provided in the videos with the information available in reliable news sources.
